title: 5.11 5.11Tactical Apparel/Equipment
description: Introducing the Defender-Flex Straight Jeans by 5.11 Tactical, a seamless blend of style, comfort, and everyday practicality for those who require extra durability and storage options without sacrificing their appearance. A classic straight-cut look ensures you'll blend in anywhere you go, while the five-pocket design plus two additional pockets provide essential space for your critical gear. These jeans feature a non-logo shank button closure up front and non-logo rivets at the hand pockets, offering discretion without compromising functionality. Reinforced belt loops and Nylon 6-reinforced hand pockets guarantee lasting durability. Built from 76% cotton and 24% polyester with T400 mechanical stretch denim, these jeans offer exceptional freedom of movement that won't bind or restrict you during everyday activities or outdoor adventures. The Defender-Flex Straight Jean is the ideal choice for a weekend trip or a night out. Explore the full Defender-Flex Collection for more styles.
